Apparently, People were recently banned from twitter for harassing the account of the Sanrio character Cinnamon.[/bq]

"Unfortunately, some of his followers don't *seem to appreciate Sanrio's signature cute and fluffy style*"

I think I found the problem.
Is because is too cute.

Molly, remember my post that explains about people turning agressive towards cute things?

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562b446636872098f990900#post_5562b446636872098f990900
Okay, why would you send the Hulk, who os also Dr, Bruce Banner, the greatest expert on gamma radiation on the planet, TO ANOTHER PLANET?! The Illuminati hit their quota for stupid with that decision.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562b5386368724235250400#post_5562b5386368724235250400
Their reason was because he was deemed too dangerous, so they trick him into beating the godseye satellite ( which actually did go insane) then repaying him by shooting him into space.

They planned to send him to a planet where he could be alone like he wanted. It goes wrong. He gets a wife. It ends bad. Hulk swears vengeance.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562b5386368724235250400#post_5562b5386368724235250400
Because he was too dangerous to remain on Earth?

"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562b5ec6368725222182600#post_5562b5ec6368725222182600
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5562b6006368720e992c0700#post_5562b6006368720e992c0700
No. The benefits of Bruce Banner outweigh the potential danger of The Hulk. Bruce Banner has forgotten more about Gamma radiation than even Tony Stark will EVER know. And considering how many gamma themed super villains there are, wouldn't a LIVING GAMMA SHIELD come in handy?!

Also fun fact. In a planet hulk tie in, boy genius Amadeus cho outright calls out the Illuminati on being assholes and derides their civil war sciuffle.

Its a good moment.
